== Classification of the document
=== Objective
This document sums up examples in interacting with the provider API. 

=== Target group

The document is aimed at software developers who are involved in implementing a client that interacts with the provider API of the VZD-FHIR-Directory.

=== Scope

*Intellectual property/patent notice*

_The following specification was created by gematik solely from a technical point of view. In individual cases, it cannot be ruled out that the implementation of the specification will interfere with the technical property rights of third parties. It is solely up to the supplier or manufacturer to take suitable measures to ensure that the products and/or services offered by him on the basis of the specification do not infringe third-party property rights and, if necessary, to obtain the necessary permits/licenses from the property right holders concerned. In this respect, gematik GmbH assumes no liability whatsoever._


== FHIRDirectoryProviderAPI
=== Query API Information
[source]
----
curl -X GET \
  'https://fhir-directory-ref.vzd.ti-dienste.de/tim-provider-services/' \
  --header 'Accept: */*' \
  --header 'User-Agent: Thunder Client (https://www.thunderclient.com)' \
  --header 'Authorization: Bearer eyJ0eXAiOiJKV1QiLCJhbGciOiJFUzI1NiJ9..lvE0wqBpoRJPFSRhApl4xregokrIRf8R_Zplg6itm5pl86PAE-uGEJh_ir0Pu2ZOrE3fbgM29zSTA6lfjN72CQ'
----
This operation returns generell API information.

.Response Content
[source]
----
{
  "title": "FederationList",
  "description": "REST Schnittstelle zur Abfrage der FÃ¶derationsliste.",
  "termsOfService": "TBD",
  "contact": {
    "name": "Firma 123",
    "url": "https://contact-url",
    "email": "contact-email"
  },
  "license": {
    "name": "license-name",
    "url": "https://license-url"
  },
  "version": "1.2.0"
}
----

=== Query FederationList
[source]
----
curl -X GET "[baseUrl]/tim-provider-services/FederationList/federationList.jws" -H "Authorization: Bearer eyJ0eXAiOiJKV1QiLCJhbGciOiJFUzI1NiJ9..hZDJXa-l1OK_B2NE54znl5FYWa5mW01Fw7LOiDo2kNIJOx2HPDCnEqxixd-7m9L34wq8WE4qVaA9jB6BNwX7qw"
----
This operation returns the federation list. 

.Response Content
[source]
----
eyJ4NWMiOlsiTUZvd0ZBWUhLb1pJemowQ0FRWUpLeVFEQXdJSUFRRUhBMElBQkJpMkt6RlE4bEs0TFMyajJVNnpYTjJkR2w1dG5TSnlGeUNMV3cyM3h1NExhY2RNOGNHY0pPdkI4Z3dwajBzQkZvNnpjMUFBaVhjdEhkbUc1TWFwenlZPSJdLCJ0eXAiOiJKV1QiLCJhbGciOiJFUzI1NiJ9..EjIT7rzdp6XFFzbBfpyanhQNQlOtno98ycqBkgHk3Q8vQKLv7HOGlNV-Y5ZdFU8R68T3hopVKM8X4Xr14uCr1g
----

=== Query MXID Location
[source]
----
curl -X GET "[baseUrl]/tim-provider-services/localization?mxid=%401-2arvtst-ap000037%3Atim.test.gematik.de' -H 'Authorization: Bearer eyJ0eXAiOiJKV1QiLCJhbGciOiJFUzI1NiJ9..gThvA77gnbQAAtDYCj9THKc8DzKdR6afOkrgldKEgspOohGU6LFdQ5KsMEkkzJ1-g2oAl6rSGa4Drhz7oIrZ9g"
----
This operation returns the location of the MXID. 

.Response Content
[source]
----
"org"
----

=== Query own domains
[source]
----
curl -X GET \
  'https://fhir-directory-ref.vzd.ti-dienste.de/tim-provider-services/federation' \
  --header 'Accept: */*' \
  --header 'User-Agent: Thunder Client (https://www.thunderclient.com)' \
  --header 'Authorization: Bearer eyJ0eXAiOiJKV1QiLCJhbGciOiJFUzI1NiJ9..g-TOcYRmT64grzhQUKsdCXXJ0wH3WSQuVQwPAh6PrvQecJFPDcOqjOba-ojcUBWeIgT4lZBwGIjC4uBNMTKL4w'
----
This operation returns all own domains. 

.Response Content
[source]
----
[
  {
    "domain": "messenger.testserver.dev",
    "telematikID": "1-SMC-B-Testkarte-123456",
    "isInsurance": false
  },
  {
    "domain": "ti-messenger.gdomain",
    "telematikID": "1-2arvtst-ap000094",
    "isInsurance": false
  },
  {
    "domain": "testserver.dev.service-ti.de",
    "telematikID": "1-1gemref-testowner-0001",
    "isInsurance": false
  }
]
----

=== Check own managed domains
[source]
----
curl -X GET \
  'https://fhir-directory-ref.vzd.ti-dienste.de/tim-provider-services/federationCheck' \
  --header 'Accept: */*' \
  --header 'User-Agent: Thunder Client (https://www.thunderclient.com)' \
  --header 'Authorization: Bearer eyJ0eXAiOiJKV1QiLCJhbGciOiJFUzI1NiJ9..g-TOcYRmT64grzhQUKsdCXXJ0wH3WSQuVQwPAh6PrvQecJFPDcOqjOba-ojcUBWeIgT4lZBwGIjC4uBNMTKL4w'
----
This operation returns the own domains that are marked as "inactive".

.Response Content
[source]
----
{
  "inactiveOrganizationDomains": [
    {
      "domain": "testserver.dev.service-ti.de",
      "telematikID": "1-1gemref-testowner-0001",
      "isInsurance": false
    }
  ]
}
----
